content: Prabhaatham

items.content: Svajaathikalleyum vijaathikalleyum rakshikkuvaanvendi oru saadhaaranakkaaraneppole kanyakayil vasikkukayum penkuttiyil yathhaarththhamaayi shareeram dharikkukayum oru daridraneppole guhayil janikkukayum cheytha mahimayulllla raajaavaaya kartthaave! Ippoll nee athbhuthakaramaayi vasicha aa kanyakayodukoodeyum ninte jananatthaal shaantamaayi ninne sparshicha bhoomiyodu koodeyum santoshasametham ninakkuvendi vaanychhicha idayanmaarodukoodeyum aanandasametham ninne vandicha mgooshanmaarodukoodeyum mahatthvatthode ninne sthuthicha svargatthodukoodeyum ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettuvaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.

content: (maalaakho dnuharo)

Dyuthisantoshamayan maalaakhaa-
Darshanamidayarkkekichonnaan
Yeehoodyaayin bethalahemil
rakshakanullavaayennevam
Santoshamezhum sa-ndesham

Vaanoreerayarinnippaaril
Shamavum shaantiyumariyichevam
Nandanajananatthin divasatthil
Sthuthi daivatthinu vaanatthil
Marthyannutthama sa-ngketham.

Vannidayanmaar guhayil pooki
Yauseppineyum kanyakayaa-kum
Mariyaamodu shishuvineyum kandu
Kaazhchakallarppichaamodam
Pinvaangi-ppo-yi.
Baarekmor. Shubaho.. Menaolam.........

Jananatthaal vinman lokarkkaa-yu
Shaantikodutthoru paithal thanne
Svargeeyaganam kaahallamoothi
Sthuthi paadi sthothram cheythu
Avanum preshakanum-sthu-thyan.
Kuriyelaayison
63-aam sangkeertthanam
Ente daivame! Nee ente daivamaakunnu; / nyaan ninakkaayi kaatthirikkum.
Daahichum varandum vellllatthinaayi aagrahikkunna bhoomi pole,/ ente aathmaavu ninnekkurichu daahichirikkunnu./ Ente jadavum ninakkaayi kaatthirikkunnu.
Ninte balavum ninte bahumaanavum kaanmaan/ iprakaaram sathyamaayittu nyaan ninne nokki.
Entennaal ninte karuna jeevanekkaall nallathaakunnu;/ ente adharangall ninne sthuthikkum.
Nyaan jeevanodirikkumpoll/ iprakaaram nyaan ninne vaazhtthukayum,/ ninte naamatthil ente kaikall uyartthukayum cheyyum.
Ente aathmaavu kozhuppum medassum kondenna pole pushdiyaakum./ Ente vaayu sthuthiyulllla adharangallkondu ninne mahathvappedutthukayum cheyyum.
Ente kidakkamel nyaan ninne ortthu; / raathrikaalangallil nyaan ninne dhyaanikkukayum cheythu.
Entennaal nee enikku sahaayakkaaranaayittheernnu.
Ninte chirakukallude nizhalil nyaan maraykkappedum.
Ente aathmaavu ninne pintudarnnu:/ Ninte valatthukai enne thaangukayum cheythu.
Ente aathmaavine nashippippaan anveshikkunnavar/bhoomiyude aazhangallilekku praveshikkum.
Avar vaallinu elppikkappedukayum, kurunarikallkku bhakshanamaayittheerukayum cheyyum; raajaavu daivatthil santoshikkum.
Avanekkondu aanayidunna evanum pukazhchayundaakum;/ entennaal asathyam parayunnavarude vaayu adaykkappedum.
Daivame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho.... Menaolam............
(kaadeeshaa dashri shkintthe)

Vismayamayanaayu srshdikallil
Vikramiyekkanyaka pettu
Idayanmaarum jnyaanikallum
Kaazhchakallavanaayarppichu.

Arachan mashihaa bethalahem
Guhayil samjaatham cheythu.
Dootharumaattidayanmaarum
Vijnyarumarppippaanetthi.

Aamosu thanayan thejasvi
Eshaayaa mun chonnathupol
Lokaparaakramiyeedivasam
Shishuvaayu samjaatham cheythu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho.. Menaolam.........

Kooraaladiyaar than chaara-
Tthavaroham cheython naathhaa!
Nyangalleyanpaal sandarshi
Chekanamaathmeeyam saukhyam.
Kuriyelaayison.
19-aam sangkeertthanam
Aakaashangall daivatthinte mahathvatthe ariyikkunnu. Aakaashatthattu avante kaivelaye kaanikkunnu. Pakal pakalinu vaakkine ucharikkunnu. Raathri raathrikku arivine ariyikkukayum cheyyunnu.
Avayude shabdam kellkkappedaattha bhaashayumilla, vaakkukallumilla. / Bhoomiyil ellaayidavum avayude ariyippum/ bhoolokatthinte athirtthikallollam avayude vachanangallum purappettirikkunnu.
Avan avayil sooryantemel avante koodaaram adichu. Athu thante manavarayil ninnu purappedunna manavaallan ennapoleyaakunnu./ Paraakramamullllavan ennapole thante vazhi oduvaan santoshikkum.
Aakaashatthinte attangallilninnu athinte purappaadum/aakaashatthinte aruthikallinmel athinte thaangalum aakunnu. Athinte aaviyilninnu maravaayirikkunnathu onnum illa.

Kartthaavinte vedapramaanam karayillaatthathum/aathmaavine thirikkunnathum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte saakshi vishvaasayogyavum/ shishukkalle jnyaanamullllavaraakkunnathum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte pramaanangall chovvullllavayum hrdayatthe santoshippikkunnavayum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte kalppana thiranyedukkappettathum/ kannukalle prakaashippikkunnathum aakunnu.

Kartthaavinekkurichulllla bhayam vedippullllathum/ennekkum nilanilkkunnathum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte nyaayavidhikall sathyamaayittullllavayum/ sakalatthilum neethiyaayittullllavayum aakunnu. Ava svarnnatthakkaallum nalla rathnangallekkaallum aagrahikkatthakkavayum /theninekkaallum thenkattayekkaallum maadhuryamullllavayum aakunnu.

Athrayumalla thante daasan avayaal sookshikkappedum./ Avan avaye aacharichaal vallare prathiphalam kittum. Pizhakalle thirichariyunnavan aar? rahasyakaaryangallil enne kuttamillaatthavanaakkittheerkkaname.

Dushdanmaar ennil adhikaarappedaathirippaanum,/paapangallilninnu nyaan vedippullllavanaayirippaanumaayitt/anyaayangallilninnu ninte daasane thadayaname. Ente sahaayakkaaranum ente rakshithaavum aaya kartthaave/ente vaayile vachanangall ninte ishdaprakaaravum/ ente hrdayatthile dhyaanam ninte mumpaakeyum irikkaname. Daivame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho..
Menaolam.......
(bro dashro bmaarbao)

Gahvarabhavanaam-mannavane paa-rasikanmaar vidvaanmaar
/tupahaarangallodudayatthil
/tnijanidhi sahitham vandichu
/t/tdeveshaa!-naathhaa! Nee-dha-nyan!

Hantamahaarkkan-parimithanaayu mi-nnum mukilil vaanarulli
/taadyaadaammin janakannu
/tbaalika maathaavaayu theernnu;
/t/tdeveshaa!-naathhaa! Nee-dha-nyan!

Engane makane nyaan ninne ppa-rilaallikkum maa-nikkum
/tennil muthirnnonen thanayan
/tnyaanettonenneyettu;
/t/tdeveshaa!-naathhaa! Nee-dha-nyan!

Vaanil ninne-yeerayarum gu-hayathilajapaalanmaarum
/tsabhayil thirujananatthaal vaa-
/tzh/u200bvettorupararum poojippoo;
/t/tdeveshaa!-naathhaa! Nee-dha-nyan!
Baarekmor. Shubaho.......... Menao.........

Aadimuthal thaa-thangkatthil chernnu rahasyam nivasichon
/tmariyaamin vimalaangkatthil
/tinnu parasyam shobhichu;
/t/tdeveshaa!-naathhaa! Nee-dha-nyan!
Kuriye.......

Kartthaavinu oru puthiya paattum/ avante sthuthiye bhoomiyude athirtthikallilninnu paaduveen./Samudratthilekku irangippokunnavarum/ athilulllla sakalavum dveepukallum/ avayil kudiyirikkunnavarume/ kartthaavinu paaduvin.

Vanavum athile graamangallum santoshikkatte. Kaador mechil sthhalangallaayirikkatte. Paarakallil koodiyirikkunnavar sthuthikkatte. / Avar parvathangallude mukallilninnu aartthukollllatte. / Kartthaavinu mahathvam kodukkukayum/ avante sthuthikalle dveepukallil ariyikkukayum cheyyatte.
Kartthaavu paraakrami ennapole purappedum./ Avan yoddhaavu ennapole vaashiye jvalippikkum./ Avan aartthu prabalappettu thante shathrukkalle samharikkum.
Aakaashangalle melilninnu aanandippin./ Meghangall neethiye thallikkatte. Bhoomi thurakkappedatte, raksha varddhikkatte. Neethi onnichu mullaykkumaaraakatte. Ivaye srshdicha kartthaavu nyaanaakunnu.
Daivame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho.. Menaolam....
(shmaayone shubaho )

Paripoornnam vaanidamaaraal
Sthuthi paadunnaarkkaayu vaanor
Avanullavaayu kaalikkoottil
Ulakavane vandikkunnu.

Aathmajayaamamganayaale
Aadaaminnoru kadameri
Rakshakaneppettoll mariyaam
Innaallaakkadavum neekki.

Yoodaayin maravilamarnna
Mannane moshdichaall thaamaar
Avall mohichoru laavanyam
Vijayashreeyinnaarjichu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho.. Menaolam....

Thvaritham paanyudayam cheythi-
Ttolliyirullil paarkkunnore
Modippaanaahvaanam che-
Ythikshithi pookiya thejassil
Aammeen
Masumoor 113: 1-9
Prakaashatthinte srashdaavinu sthuthi: Kartthaavinte bhrthyanmaare! Sthuthi paaduvin. Kartthaavinte naamatthe sthuthippin.
Kartthaavinte naamam aadimuthal ennekkum vaazhtthappettathaakunnu.
Sooryante udayam muthal athinte asthamanam vareyum kartthaavinte naamam valiyathaakunnu.
Kartthaavu sakala jaathikallkkummel unnathanum, thante mahatthvam aakaashangallkku meetheyum aakunnu.
Uyaratthil vasikkukayum aazhatthil nokkukayum cheyyunna nammude daivamaaya kartthaavinodu sadrshyan aakaashatthilum bhoomiyilum aarulllloo?

Avan elliyavane janatthinte prabhukkanmaarodukoode irutthendathinu kuppayilninnu uyartthunnu. Avan machiyaayavalle makkallude santoshamulllla maathaavaayi bhavanatthil vasikkumaaraakkukayum cheyyunnu.
Daivame sthuthi ninakk.......
Shubaho - menaolam.......
(yaumono sohu vanahes)

Inneeredoothaganam vaaneennetthi-thaljananam kaanmaan
/tmellichoo-bethalahem guhayil
/tnarasurasamsthuthi geethangall
/tbhoojaa-thikalle!-yavane sathatham vaazhtthin.

Mariyaam thannaathmajanaam jeevaathmajane- vachaall pulkkoottil
/tkarayunnu-shishuvinu thulyamavan
/tsuravarasanchayamanchunnu,
/tbhoojaa-thikalle!-yavane sathatham vaazhtthin.

Vaaneennaathmajanetthigaathram poondaan-daaveedaathmajayil
/tidayanmaar-kaahallaravametti
/tdoothasamooham kumpittu,
/tbhoojaa-thikalle!-yavane sathatham vaazhtthin.
Baarekmor, shubaho..... Menaolam......

Aardrathayaal hithamaayu paazhtthuni chuttippul-tthottiyil nikshipthaa
/tudayone!-krpayaalippoll ni-
/tnnaamgyatthaal pizhapokkaname,
/tbhoojaa-thikalle!-yavane sathatham vaazhtthin.
Kuriye….
Matthaayi 5:3-12
Aathmaavil daridraraayavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entu kondennaal svargaraajyam avarudethaakunnu.
Duഃkhichirikkunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukondannaal avar aashvaasappedum.
Saumyathayullllavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukondennaal avar bhoomiye avakaashamaayi anubhavikkum.
Neethikkaayi vishannudaahikkunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar entukondennaal avar thrptharaakum.
Karunayullllavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukondennaal avarudemel karunayundaakum.
Hrdayashuddhiyullllavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukondennaal; avar daivatthe kaanum.
Samaadhaanam nadatthunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entu kondennaal avar daivatthinte puthranmaarennu villikkappedum.
Neethi nimitthamaayittu peedippikkappedunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukondennaal svargaraajyam avarudethaakunnu.
Avar ningalle nindikkayum ningalle peedippikkayum, ente nimittham sakala durvachanattheyum ningallude nere vyaajamaayittu parayukayum cheyyumpoll ningall bhaagyavaanmaar.
Ningallude prathiphalam svargatthil varddhichirikka kondu ningall santoshichu aanandippin.
Baarekmor. Shubaho menu olam…
(shubaho loku msheeho)

Thaaraka porassile-vijnyareyariyichu
Kaazhchakallavarenti-tthirumahimaykkarullee
/tkuntiruvum ponnum moorum.

Udayone! Ninne-raajajyothsyanmaar
Garhithabethalahem-guhayil pranamichu
/tninprekshakanaayi sthothram.

Gaganatthil shaanti-kshithithannil shaanti
Preethiyadanyudayon-jananaarththham vannaan
/taadaminepparirakshippaan.
Baarekmor..........
Shubaho veekkoro usegattho uraabusu yoyooso neshatthva dnaasakku laabo ulabraa valrooho kaadeeshaa.
Menaolam.

Aadatthinumellaa-lokatthinumaayi
Shaantimahaamodam-salgathiyivayenti
/tsamrakshakavathsan vannu.
Sthaumenkaalosu kuriyelaayison

items.content: Nithyathayil adrshyanaayi thante pithaavinte madiyil sthhithicheyyunnavanum thanteyum pithaavinteyum jeevanulllla vishuddha roohaayudeyum thiruvishdaprakaaram udayam cheythu prathyakshappeduvaan krpaapurassaram thiruvullllamundaayavanum aaya adrshyashishuvum, lokangallekkaall unnathanum srshdikallekkaall valiyavanumaayirikke thante

Srshdiyude adukkalekku vannavanum, thante jananiyude mahithamaaya madiyil kaanappetta ashareeriyum aathmeeyanum, lokangallkku adrshyanaayirikke manushya snehatthode jananatthinaayi vannavanum thante poornnathayaal sakalattheyum aishvaryasampannamaakkiya paripoornnanum aaya kartthaavinu sthuthi. Thanikku ee prabhaatha praarththhanaa samayatthum.........

Daivattheppole nithyanaayi aarambhamillaatthavanaayirikke aarambhamullllavanaaya manushyaneppole avasaanam kanyakaprasavicha aadyantamillaattha shishuve! Ninakku sthuthi, ninakku sthothram. Prakaashangallude naathhan sooryaneppole yogyamaayi udaratthil ninnudich, thante shreshdhamaaya udayatthaal sarvvasrshdikalleyum poornnamaayi prakaashippichu. Udarangallil shishukkalle vallartthunnavan thiruvishdatthode udaratthinnullllil shishuvaayittheernnu. Lokangallkkum srshdikallkkum mumpeyullllavanum daaveedine srshdichavanumaayavan, kaalapoornnathayil daaveeduputhriyilninnu puthuthaayi janichu. Thalamurakallekkaallum vamshangallekkaallum poorvvikan, kaalaavasaanatthil cheriya shishuvineppole kaanappettu. Bhoomiyilekku mazhayum manyum ayaykkunnavan manushyaneppole manushyaputhriyude mulakallilninnu paalukoodichu. Thante shakthiyaal parvvathangalle srshdikkunnavan daridraneppole guhayilkidannu. Thante balatthaal aakaashamandalatthe vahichirikkunnavane, penkutti avallude kaikallil laghuvaayi vahichu. Shreshdhamaaya prakaashatthil aavaasam cheythirikkunnavan, elliyavaneppole pazhantunikallaal aavaranam cheyyappettu. Thante shakthiyaal kroobenmaarudemel aaroodhanaayirikkunnavan mariyaaminte bhujangallaal shaantamaayi aaghoshikkappettu. Thanikku kaadeeshu paaduvaanaayi sraappenmaare aavesham kollllikkunnavan daaveeduputhriyaal aanandapoorvvam thaalolikkappettu. Thante aamgyatthaal srshdikalle paayikkunnavan bethalahemil shishuvineppole shaantamaayi neentinadannu. Aakayaal nyangallude rakshayeprathi nee pravartthicha athbhuthatthe vismayapoorvvam parishodhikkukayum, nyangallkkuvendiyulllla ninte vyaapaaratthe athishayapoorvvam nireekshikkukayum cheythukond, athbhuthabharithamaayi nyangallellaavarumkoodi orumichu parayunnu: Daivasvabhaavatthilninnu vyathyaasam varaathe nee manushyanaayittheernnathinaal daivame nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Nyangallude rakshaykkuvendi jadaprakaaram thante shreshdhathayil kaanappettathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Aakaashavum bhoomiyum ninnaal poornnamaayi niranyirikke guhayil kidannathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Nee bhayangkaramaaya nilayil athirtthi illaatthavanaayirikke kanyakayude madiyil samkshepikkappettathinaal nee athbhuthavum ninte nithyatha athirtthi illaatthathumaakunnu. Shreshdhanaaya adrshyanum avarnnaneeyanumaaya daivamaayirikke manushyanaayittheernnathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Maalaakhamaarum idayanmaareyum mgooshanmaareyum aakarshikkukayum avar uchithamaayi ninte bahumaanyathaye aaraadhikkuvaan varikayum cheythathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ninte jananatthaal melullllavarudeyum thaazheyullllavarudeyum idayil yogyamaayi nirappum samaadhaanavum vithachathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ninte janmadinatthil svargeeyareyum bhaumeekareyum santoshippikkukayum, maddhyatthil sthhithi cheythirunna veli shakthiyode pollichu kallayukayum cheythathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ninte aamgyam ellaa bhaagangalleyum athirtthikalleyum vahichirikke penkutti ninne vahichathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Lokangalle uthsaahapoorvvam pottunnavanaayirikke sthanangallilninnu paalukudichathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ninte jananatthaal sakala svargeeyarum bhaumikarum athishayikkukayum ninakku poornnamaaya sthuthi nalkukayum cheythathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ninte janana divasatthil melullllavareyum thaazheyullllavareyum nee samyojippikkukayum avaronnaake ninte shreshdhathaykku sthuthipaadhakanmaaraayi bhavikkukayum cheythathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Uyaratthil agnirathham ninte bahumaanyathaye vahikkukayum ninte aamgyam kartthavyatthode srshdikalle vahikkukayum cheyyave kanyaka ninne vahichathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Agnimayanmaar ninte thejassil chullungippokave mgooshanmaarum idayanmaarum manushyaneppole ninne spashdamaayi kandathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ninte janana divasatthil aadaamyavargatthinu vividhanilakallil nalla prathyaasha undaayathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Daivattheppole sphadikasimhaasanatthinmel aaghoshikkappedunnavanaayirikke shishuvineppole snehapoorvvam kaalmuttukallil vallartthappettathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ahangkaarikallaaya pishaachukkallude adimathvatthil ninnum ninte prathiroopatthe ninte jananam moolam rakshichathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Thiruvishdaprakaaramulllla ninte manushyaavathaaratthinte divasatthil srshdiyil ninte prakaasham udippikkukayum sakala dikkukallilninnum andhakaarattha dureekarikkukayum cheythathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Vishuddhamaaya ninte jananadivasatthil doorasthhare nee villikkukayum avar sameepasthharodukoodi sammellikkuvaan idayaavukayum cheythathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ninte jadadhaaranatthaal pithaavine srshdikallumaayi ramyappedutthukayum bhoothalatthil dhaaraallamaayi nirappum samaadhaanavum vithaykkukayum cheythathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ninte jananadivasatthil svargeeyanmaar kaahallamoothi daaveedinte pattanatthil mashihaakartthaavenna rakshakan innu ningallkkuvendi sathyamaayi janichirikkunnu ennu idayanmaarodu prasamgichathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Ninte jananatthil agnimayanmaar ninakku sthuthiyum bhoomikku samaadhaanavum manushyarkku nalla sharanavum vismayaneeyamaayi kaahallamoothi ariyichathinaal nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Nee athbhuthamaakunnu. Nyangallude rakshaykku vendiyulllla ninte manushyaavathaaravrtthaantam thikachum avarnnaneeyamaakunnu. Aakayaal vismayaneeya shishuve! Kanyakamariyaamilninnulllla ninte vishuddhavum mahaneeyavumaaya ee jananadivasatthil thirusannidhiyil nyangallarppikkunna ee sugandha dhoopammoolam nyangall praarththhikkukayum apekshikkukayum cheyyunnu. Nyangallkkuvendiyulllla ninte athishayakaramaaya jadadhaaranatthekkurichu yathhaarththhamaaya jnyaanavum nyangallude rakshayeprathi thaathparyatthodukoodiyulllla ninte manushyaavathaaratthekkurichu sathyamaaya vishvaasavum nyangallkku nalkaname. Nyangallellaavarkkum poornnamaayi kadangallude mochanavum paapaparihaaravum nyangallude aathmashareerangallude duഃkha kaaranangallilninnu poornnamaaya viduthalum nalkaname. Kartthaave nee paapikalle nirmmaleekarichu paapaparihaaram nalkunnavanum anuthaapikalle poornnamaayi vishuddheekarikkunnavanum sabhayude sarvvaprajakallkkum nithyasahaayiyum thunayum aayirikkaname. Ninte sharanatthil prathyaashayodukoodi munkootti nidrapraapicha vishvaasikallaaya nyangallude pithaakkanmaarkkum sahodaranmaarkkum gurukkanmaarkkum sakala paretharkkum nalla ormma nalkaname. Nyangalleyum avareyum ninte valathubhaagatthu santoshapoorvvam nilkkunnathinum ninte raajyatthile vividha aanandangall anubhavikkunnathinum yogyaraakkittheerkkaname. Nyangallum avarum orumichu ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddha roohaaykkum ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettunnu. Daivatthilninn….

content: (bkul medem)

Suvisheshatthin divasamithil
Santoshatthin divasamithil
/trakshakane mariyaam pettaallenne-vam
Thaarakayothiyabhijnyanmaar vannu vandi-ppaan
Dootharumajapaalanmaarum vandanamarppichu
/tsroppenmaar kaadeeshaartthu
/tkroobenmaar vaazhtthippaadi
Keeratthuniyaalaavrthanaam
Paduvrddhanumariyaam sthanyam
Ekunnu yauseppothunnu sthothram
Baarekmor , shubaho.

Vathsalare! Mahadaashcharyam
Vachanam Daivam mariyaami-
/tnnudaratthil mevitthanuvengane poondaan
Shruthi vazhiyaathmaavaayu pookkaan vaathil thurakkaa-the
Udaratthil srshdichoru than meyyoduvellivaa-yaan
/tavallil hithamaarnnullavaayaan
/tkanyaamudraykkazhivenye
Eeyulpaadanamaashcharyam!
Ee janmavumathyaashcharyam!
Naravadivaarnnengalle rakshichon dha-nyan

Aadaammyarkkuththhaanatthin
Vaakkarulliya mashihaanaathhan
/tvishvaasikallodu than doothil chonne -vam
Enmeyu bhakshichenraktham paanam cheyvo-nil
Nyaan vaanidumavanennullllil vaanidumennekkum
/tnaathhaa! Nee mahimaavodunin
/tdoothanmaarotthanayumpoll
Nin sharanatthil nidritharaam
Daasarkkampoduyireki
Santosham nirayum pantiyilettenam.
Moriyo...

items.content: Kanyakamariyaamenna varandabhoomiyilninnu vithayo nanaykkalo koodaathe killirtthuvanna anugrheethaphalavum thalamurakallude sahaayatthinaayi bethalahem ophartthaayil pultthottiyil kidannavanum aathmeeyamaaya thante parimallatthaal doorasthhareyum sameepasthhareyum sakalabhaagangalleyum aanandippichavanum aaya kartthaave! Ippoll nyangallude aathmaakkallaakunna aantareeyabethalahemil nee ninnetthanne sthhaapikkaname. Nyangallude hrdayangallaakunna devaalayangallile aantareeyaroopangallaal thirumeni dhoopikkappedumaaraakaname. Ninte snehamaakunna parimallavaasanayaal nyangallude sakala antarindriyangalleyum aanandippikkaname. Nyangall ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum parishuddharuhaayeyum santoshatthodum aanandatthodum
Koode sthuthikkukayum aahllaadatthode ninakku perunnaall aacharikkukayum pukazhchakallodukoodi ninakku aaghosham nadatthukayum cheyyumaaraakaname.

content: (loku moriyo)

Vaaneennum maalaakhaamaar vannariyichu
Bhoopathi jaatham cheythennidayare be-thalahemil
Aa nirmmalaraadukallekkondihavannoo
Rakshaykketthiya daivatthin kunyaadin perkkaayu
/tsthuthi meyyo-davar kandathumoolam
/tsthuthi manujan-than janiyaarnnone!
Sthuthi janmatthaalapathhattheennum ra-kshichone
Baarekmor. Shubaho..

Nibiyanmaareeshodevaa! Vimalaathmaavaal
Ninmarmmangalle munchonnaagamanam-ghoshichu
Eshaayaa nin garbhattheppiraviye daavee-
Dudayatthe skkariyaa, meekhaa nin praa-balyatthe
/thaskkeeyel-nin therin prabhaye
/tdaaneeyel-maanyaasanamathine
Jananatthinu vannikshithiye rakshi-chon dhanyan
Menaolam..........

Paavanathanu bhakshichoraayu jeevanaraktham
Paanamcheytha parethajanangall than-dehiyilum
Aathmatthilumakshayalokatthaappaapatthin
Irull vaazhaayvaan mashihaayodu naamarththhikkenam
/tavarude yaa-thmaakkalleyettone!
/tnaathhaa! Nin-peedaye saakshichaar
Aahvaanam cheythangavare valamaay- nirtthaname.
Pethgomo

Haale-uhaale-naathhan chonnennoden thanayannee-
Innaall ninneyulpaadippichen- haale..........

items.content: Doothanmaar avare vittu svargatthil poyashesham idayanmaar: Naam betthlehemollam chennu kartthaavu nammodu ariyicha ee sambhavam kaanenam ennu thammil paranyu. Avar baddhappettu chennu, mariyayeyum yosephineyum pashutthottiyil kidakkunna shishuvineyum kandu. Kandashesham ee paithalinekkurichu thangallodu paranya vaakku ariyichu. Kettavar ellaavarum idayanmaar paranyathinekkurichu aashcharyappettu. Mariya ee vaarttha okkeyum hrdayatthil samgrahichu dhyaanichukondirunnu. Thangallodu ariyichathupole idayanmaar kettathum kandathumaaya ellaattineyumkurichu daivatthe mahathvappedutthiyum pukazhtthiyum kondu madangippoyi.

content: Kukkiliyon

Ninnaall sthuthiyodu raajamakall-haa-haa
Nin valamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.
/tnayavaan pana pole thallirtthidume haa-haa
/tvallarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol.
Makkallilappan krpa cheythu pole-haa-haa
Bhakthanmaaril Daivam krpa cheyyum.
Baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…
Ekbo

Sthuthi daivatthinnuyaratthil
Than maathaavinnunnathiyum
Mahimaamudi sahadenmaarkkum
Mrtharil karunayumundaaka.
Sthaumen ... Kuriye …
Kolokall - daivamaathaav
(shllomme daabo)

Thaathan shlommo gabreeyel
moolam meleennaa dhanya
/tmariyaaminu nalkappettu
/tthee poondon vaayil thingum shlommo chonnaan naathhan nin
Koode thannudayam ninnil.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ...
Parishuddhanmaar

Shlommo than nibiyanmaarkkum
Shlommo than shleehanmaarkkum
/tshlommo shlemmo naathhangkal
/tkoorerum sahadenmaarkkum
shlommo than makkall vasikkum
Parishuddhasabhaykkum shlommo.
Menaolam
Parethar

Naam daivasuthanmaaraavaan
Aayushkaalatthilcholli-
/ttthannatthaathare orkkenam
/tnayavaanmaarpunyappetto-
Ronnichekumavarkkaashvaa-
Sam svarge puthrandaivam.
Moriyo raahem …
Maar yaakkobinte bovusso

Paadin paadin paadin paadin haaleluyyaa
Aattidayanmaar bethalahemil paadiyapole

Innaall vamshatthalayaamaadaam modikkatte
Ninjanmatthaal daivathvam yaachanapolettaan

Duഃkham neekkum paithalineppotteedukayaale
Innaall havvaayaadatthekkaall sthuthi paadatte

Neenaallbimbatthekkooppiya vaarddhakyamperum
Lokatthin dandaakendum kompinnaallundaay

Veenyaal thapthakshoniye sechicheedaaninnaall
Eeshaayu gehattheennundaayi muntirivalllli

Paadin paadin paadin paadin haaleluyyaa
Aattidayanmaar bethalahemil paadiyapole
Kaumaa (kaadeeshaatthu aaloho)

Shuddhan nee aaloho! Haaleluyyaa
Shuddhan nee balavaane! Kuriyelaayisson
Shuddhan nee mrthiheenaa! + krooshettu veendavane
(moonnu praavashyam)

Kartthaave! Krpacheyyaname-haaleluyyaa
Kartthaave! Krpacheyu kanivaal-kuriyelaa-yison
Kartthaave! Karmmaarththhanakalle-yettittavayaal krpacheytheedaname.

Sthuthyan nee aaloho! Haaleluyyaa
Sthuthyan nee srashdaave! Kuriyelaayisson
Sthuthyan nee paapikalladiyaaril-krpacheytheedum mashihaa-raajaave! Baarekmor
Svargasthhanaaya nyangallude pithaave.....
Krpa niranya mariyame!.
